title: Dusk of Dawn - "sleepless vigilance" in context

content.question: In context, the phrase "sleepless vigilance" (Paragraph 2) suggests

choices.label: the disruptive ferment of new ideas
the determined enforcement of a system

content.answer: the determined enforcement of a system

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Explain how word choice, comparisons, and syntax contribute to the specific tone or style of a text.
